Sadhguru in Singapore

Checkin Information

Dear {{FIRST_NAME}},

We look forward to having you at the Meet, Mingle, & Meditate event with Sadhguru in Singapore. Please note this email is only an informational email and you should bring your E-Ticket email to check in.

If you have not yet received your E-Ticket via email, please contact us at singapore@ishayoga.org with the following details:

  • Buyer's email address
  • Ticket Ref# displayed in the Buyer's dashboard
Date: Sunday, Jan 22, 2017
Time: 4pm to 8:45pm - Check-in starts at 1pm
Venue: Singapore EXPO, Hall 1
Contact: singapore@ishayoga.org / +65-61004064
Venue Information
How to reach the venue:
  • By MRT: Alight at EXPO MRT Station and take Exit A
    Please note walk from MRT Stn till Hall 1 may take upto 15 minutes. So, we request you to plan your arrival at venue accordingly.
  • By Bus: 12, 24 and 38
  • Map: Link
Parking
  • Public Car Park (accessible to cars only) is available
  • Please note we have arranged for subsidized parking coupons with the venue: $13.50/- per day (Single Entry). These coupons will be available on a first-come first-serve basis at the "Car Park" counter.
Click here for further information on directions to the venue.
Guidelines amd Useful Information
Checking-in:
  • Upon arrival at EXPO, proceed to Checkin counters outside EXPO Hall 1.
  • Checkin counters will open at 1:00 PM
    Please ensure that you are seated in the hall by 3:45 PM, as once the event starts, to avoid disturbance to other participants, you will be seated in last bays.
  • Carry your photo ID, with name matching the name on the E-Ticket.
  • If ticket has been transferred and the transfer details have not been informed to us, please bring a signed authorisation letter from the original participant with your name and e-ticket number.
On-Spot Registrations & Upgrades:
  • New tickets can be booked on the spot from 1PM to 4PM on Sunday at the "Walk-in Registration" counter. Same applies if you wish to upgrade your seating category.
Additional notes
  • Please note that the program is open only for ages 15 and above.
  • There is no particular dress code, but it is advisable to wear loose comfortable clothes.
